inclusion.criterion: Phenotypic females greater than or equal to 10 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Those with a karyotype of 45X/46XX must have at least 80% 45X lymphocytes.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biological parent of a TS subject
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago.
